verses.roman:
yāṅhā haite viśvotpatti, yāṅhāte pralaya
sei puruṣera saṅkarṣaṇa samāśraya

synonyms: yāṅhā haite—from whom; viśva-utpatti—the creation of the material cosmic manifestation; yāṅhāte—in whom; pralaya—merging; sei puruṣera—of that Supreme Personality of Godhead; saṅkarṣaṇa—of the name Saṅkarṣaṇa; samāśraya—the original shelter.
translation: Saṅkarṣaṇa is the original shelter of the puruṣa, from whom this world is created and in whom it is dissolved.
